short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get to know your friends in this wild party game for adults.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to ignite some excitement? Presenting Most Likely To, the fun Chrome extension for an unforgettable time.

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Most Likely To.

Add it to your Chrome now and let the good times roll!
